structure.head: Chin high and look slightly away with a confident gaze.
structure.hands: Rest your hand on your waist and pull your elbow back to create space.
structure.feet: Cross your front leg over and point your toe toward the camera.

structure.head: Lean your head back against the wall and keep your expression soft.
structure.hands: Bring both hands up to your hair and let your elbows go wide.
structure.feet: Lean your hip into the wall and keep your legs long and straight.

title: 性感蹲姿

structure.head: Slightly tilted head with a direct gaze at the camera, hair flowing naturally to one side.
structure.hands: One hand resting lightly on the ground for support, the other hand resting gently on the knee.
structure.feet: Kneeling position with one leg bent at the knee and the other foot flat on the ground.

tips: 利用自然光，避免过于强烈的直射光
选择简洁的背景，突出人物
引导模特放松，展现自然状态
